trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 루트 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로에 활동 상태 이벤트에 해당 하는 활동 정규화 된 위치를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]활동 실행 상태가 변경 될 때마다 워크플로 인스턴스는 런타임 추적 인프라에는 활동 상태 이벤트를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> whenever an activity status event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 추적 서비스로 보낼 수는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>활동 상태 이벤트가 발생할 때마다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 추적 서비스는 워크플로 인스턴스의 지정 된 위치에 활동의 특정 종류와 관련 된 활동 상태 이벤트에만 워크플로 인스턴스에서 발생 하는 모든 활동 상태 이벤트에 관심이 없으므로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ActivityTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식을 지정 하 여 해당 위치에 대 한 일치 하는 매개 변수를 정의 하는 한 ActivityTrackingLocation, 집합이 한 활동 상태 변경 이벤트 및 인스턴스 또는 참조 활동 형식의 인스턴스를 보다 정확 하 게 정규화 할 수 있는 조건 집합입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single ActivityTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 단일 ActivityTrackingLocation 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로 있는 둘 이상의 실제 위치를 참조할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You add ActivityTrackingLocation objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> in order to define the match parameters for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTrackingLocation 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 대 한 일치 매개 변수를 정의 하기 위해</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> 추가

trans-unit.source: You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 설정 하 여 일치 시킬 참조 활동 형식을 지정 해야

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동에 대 한 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> to specify the activity status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>값을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>일치 시킬 활동 상태 이벤트를 지정 하려면.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>개체를 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>특정 조건에 대 한 참조 활동 형식에 대 한 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 참조 활동 형식의 특정 명명 된 인스턴스만에 관심을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor and you do not explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code, then if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> is later used on your tracking profile an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자를 사용 하 고 설정 하지 않으면 명시적으로 하나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>코드의 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>예외가 throw 됩니다 추적 프로필에서 나중에 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified activity name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 지정된 된 활동 이름을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 "CodeActivity"입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> is set to `activityTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>로 설정 된 `activityTypeName`합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| 로 지정 된 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 `activityTypeName` 참조 활동 형식의. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityTypeName가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the specified reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 지정 된 참조 활동 형식을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> is set to `activityType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>로 설정 된 `activityType`합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| 로 지정 된 참조 활동 유형에 `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>활동.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityType가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 참조 활동 유형이 지정 된 정규화 되지 않은 이름의 있고 지정 된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트를 일치 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 "CodeActivity"입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `ExecutionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| 로 지정 된 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 `activityTypeName` 참조 활동 형식의. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>로 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>값이 들어 있는 `ExecutionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 하나 또는 두 개를 포함 하는 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: activityTypeName가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서)-또는- executionStatusEvents 가 null 참조 ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type and matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 된 지정 된 참조 활동 유형이 하며 지정 된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| 로 지정 된 참조 활동 유형에 `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>로 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>값이 들어 있는 `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>활동.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 하나 또는 두 개를 포함 하는 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityType가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: -또는- executionStatusEvents 가 null 참조 ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 참조 활동 유형이 지정 된 정규화 되지 않은 이름의 참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 지정 하 고 지정 된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트와 일치 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is"CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: CLR 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 "CodeActivity"입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|The unqualified name specified by `activityTypeName` of the reference activity type.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| 로 지정 된 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 `activityTypeName` 참조 활동 형식의. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>로 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>값이 들어 있는 `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| 에 지정 된 값 `matchDerivedTypes`. |</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동 하는 경우는 일치 해야 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 하나 또는 두 개를 포함 하는 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: activityTypeName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: activityTypeName가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서)-또는- executionStatusEvents 가 null 참조 ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"></xref> class that has the specified reference activity type, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation"> </xref> 된 참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 지정 하 고 지정 된 활동 실행 상태 이벤트를 일치 하는 지정 된 참조 활동 유형이 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing`).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>|The reference activity type specified by `activityType`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>|A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> that contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values specified by `executionStatusEvents`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>|The value specified by `matchDerivedTypes`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>| Null 참조 (`Nothing`). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>| 로 지정 된 참조 활동 유형에 `activityType`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>| 빈 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>| <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>로 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>값이 들어 있는 `executionStatusEvents`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A>| 에 지정 된 값 `matchDerivedTypes`. |</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of an activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>활동.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동 하는 경우는 일치 해야 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 하나 또는 두 개를 포함 하는 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: activityType is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityType가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: -or- executionStatusEvents is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: -또는- executionStatusEvents 가 null 참조 ().

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the reference activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 참조 활동의 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 형식을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or ActivityType for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> ActivityType</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the reference activity type in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 버전에 관계 없이 참조 활동 형식을 지정 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> 사용

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>활동의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.
trans-unit.target: 위치의 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity set ActivityTypeName to "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 정규화 되지 않은 이름을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>활동 ActivityTypeName "CodeActivity"를 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName는 XML로 직접 프로필을 작성할 때 참조 활동 형식을 지정 하는 보다 편리한 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 또한 ActivityTypeName 참조 활동 형식을 참조 하는 버전에 관계 없이 방법을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> 지정 해야

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 형식의 정규화 되지 않은 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동에 관심을 정규화 하는 데 사용 되는 조건 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 보다 정확 하 게 일치 시킬 참조 활동 형식의 인스턴스를 정의 하려면 조건을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to"CodeActivity" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 일치 시키려면 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>사용 하 여 활동은 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>"MyCode" 같음, 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>"CodeActivity"를 추가 하 고는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>되도록 지정 하는 상황는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>활동 인스턴스의 속성이 "MyCode"와 일치 해야 합니다..</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be `true` and one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 모든 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>조건에 있어야 `true` 중 하나는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>에 값을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A>일치 해야는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>일치 시킬.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> 활동에 관심을 정규화 하는 데 사용 되는 조건을 포함 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에 대 한 작업 목록이 일치 시킬 수 있는 상태 이벤트를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: ExecutionStatusEvents specifies the activity status events for which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> can be matched.
trans-unit.target: ExecutionStatusEvents는에 대 한 활동 상태 이벤트를 지정 된 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>일치 시킬 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in ExecutionStatusEvents must be matched and every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>ExecutionStatusEvents 값이 일치 해야 합니다 매 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>해야 `true` 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>일치 시킬.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 빈 목록 일치 시킬 이벤트가 없으면 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> that contains one or more of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> 중 하나 이상을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 빈 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched.
trans-unit.target: 참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동을 일치시킬지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if activities derived from the reference activity type of the location should be matched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>위치의 참조 활동 유형에 서 파생 된 활동을 일치시킬지; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
